title: Neil M. Maher, “Apollo in the Age of Aquarius” (Harvard UP, 2017)
description:
In the summer of 1969, two seminal events of the sixties happened within a few weeks of each other: the first man walked on the moon and the Woodstock music festival was held in upstate New York. At first glance, these two events might appear to have little to do...
